Html:
Hi,

It can be run on my local computer, but how to publish it on my real website?ï¼ˆIt's on webhosting, I'm just for learning how to publish MVC project on real website now).

Is there any special web hosting requirement for MVC project?  I just simply upload whole project to website, but it doesn't work. (only know this website supports ASP.NET. )

 

Thanks,

Your server needs to be running .NET 3.5 SP1 or .NET 4 to run an ASP.NET MVC 2 application. If ASP.NET MVC 2 isn't installed on your server but you have .NET 3.5 SP1 or .NET 4, you can /bin deploy the MVC 2 dependencies.

I wrote blog post about MVC 2 installation options here: http://weblogs.asp.net/jgalloway/archive/2010/07/13/server-installation-options-for-asp-net-mvc-2.aspx

really thanks,

I did as instruction. After bin deploy. In folder:

[App_Data,bin,Content,Scripts,Views (these are folder name)    Global.asax,Web.config (file name)]

I upload these to my webhosting "Test" folder. It says "directory listing denied" when I browse.
What version of IIS is your server running? What version of ASP.NET?

Hi, I set up new website, MVC seems  work, but I got error message. how do I solve this? 

Sorry to keep asking questions,but I'm beginner for this, I really need help.  =) Thanks!
